streamlabs_essentials.creator: Yazaar
streamlabs_essentials.info: Contains multiple commands that should be essential in Streamlabs Chatbot. For more info check the link!

gamble.creator: Yazaar
gamble.info: Gamble your points away, this script contains a gamble random command. Pick within a range and let the computer pick. You are of course able to gamble a set amount as well. Change any settings thru chat commands!

viewercommands.creator: Yazaar
viewercommands.info: Give users the possibility to have their own command that they can change on demand! Nightbot is required! Open link for more info

lootdrop.creator: Yazaar
lootdrop.info: Reward active users and let them collect loot in form of points. The command activates at different times (configurable as well) and deactivates after a set amount of times, as well a feature to randomized pick a few lucky winners (more points).
